Eastern & Oriental Express - Wild Malaysia | World Journeys | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Eastern & Oriental Express Wild Malaysia 4 Days | Singapore to Johor Experience the glamour of rail travel aboard Belmond’s Eastern & Oriental Express. Journey from vibrant Singapore through Malaysia’s lush jungles to the wildlife-rich Taman Negara National Park and the cultural mosaic of Penang Island. Indulge in adventure, nature, exquisite cuisine, and art on a truly unforgettable journey. Deal Details Travel Dates Select dates April to October Priced From $8,455 per person Enquire Now Experience the glamour of rail travel aboard Belmond’s Eastern & Oriental Express. Journey from vibrant Singapore through Malaysia’s lush jungles to the wildlife-rich Taman Negara National Park and the cultural mosaic of Penang Island. Indulge in adventure, nature, exquisite cuisine, and art on a truly unforgettable journey. Pricing Pricing quoted is the lead-in rate. As Belmond operate dynamic pricing, rates can vary significantly closer to departure time Please request an up-to-date quote from us at the time of enquiry Twin From 2025 1 Oct - 31 Oct Pullman Cabin, from NZ$7,415 State Cabin, from NZ$10,450 Presidential Suite, from NZ$18,930 2026 Pullman Cabin, from NZ$8,455 State Cabin, from NZ$12,360 Presidential Suite, from NZ$22,360 What's Included Three nights onboard the luxury Eastern & Oriental Express All table d’hote meals Excursions escorted by expert guides A selection of wines, spirits, beers and soft drinks Presidential Suites also enjoy champagne plus complimentary mini-bar Dedicated 24-hour steward service Return transfers between your Singapore hotel and the train What's Not Included Premium drinks and drinks ordered to your cabin Gratuities Itinerary Day 1: Singapore - Gemas Settle into your air-conditioned cabin as you travel through lush green landscapes. Day 2: Jungle Line to Taman Negara Enjoy a wildlife excursion into Taman Negara National Park, one of the oldest tropical rainforests in the world. Day 3: West Coast Line to Penang Explore Penang Island on an art tour or a food tour with cooking class, or opt to explore independently by tri-shaw. Day 4: Johor - Singapore Travel through the rainforests and beaches of Johor, crossing the strait to Singapore where your journey ends. Your Train Travel in style across 15 beautifully restored carriages featuring Pullman, State, and Presidential Suites. Each cabin boasts warm cherrywood and elm paneling, ensuite bathrooms, and full air-conditioning. Presidential Suites include a minibar and private transfers for ultimate luxury. By day, beds convert into comfortable seating with stunning views. Dining Savor reinvented traditional Peranakan dishes that showcase Malaysia’s unique flavors with a modern twist. Observation Car Relax with cocktails in an elegant bar setting, complete with an outdoor deck to soak in panoramic views and unforgettable sunsets. Piano Bar The heart of the train, offering lively evening entertainment blending Nanyang jazz, Malay vintage tunes, and Western hits for a vibrant social scene. Terms & Conditions Prices vary seasonally, are subject to change due to currency fluctuations, and surcharges may apply over festive periods. Please enquire for specific travel dates as a quote for cross-season dates may be required. Further World Journeys terms & conditions apply, see https://worldjourneys.co.nz/terms/ Added Value Offer Valid for double occupancy bookings for all accommodation types. Offer excludes Tastes of Tomorrow, Festive Malaysia and Malaysia Celebration departures. Experience the world differently.
